title: Uploaded Files
description: This section contains all the files uploaded by users. Currently, no files have been uploaded. Users can submit relevant documents for processing.

title: Audio File
description: Audio recordings submitted by users for analysis will appear here. No audio files have been uploaded yet. Please check again later.

title: User Activity
description: This report provides insights into user interactions with the platform, including login patterns, time spent, and feature usage trends over time.

title: Sales Report
description: The sales report displays transaction details, revenue generation trends, and product performance for Q1. The data helps in understanding sales growth and customer preferences.

title: Complaint Statistics
description: An overview of complaints submitted by users, categorized by type, resolution time, and priority levels. This report aids in improving customer support efficiency.

title: Performance Analytics
description: This section includes key performance indicators (KPIs) such as system uptime, response time, and service availability to ensure optimal user experience.

title: Financial Summary
description: A financial overview including total revenue, expenses, and net profit trends. The report helps in assessing the companyâ€™s financial health.

title: Product Engagement
description: This report tracks how users interact with different features of the platform, identifying popular functionalities and areas for improvement.

title: Customer Feedback
description: Feedback received from users through surveys and support tickets. This report categorizes feedback by sentiment and provides actionable insights.

title: Incident Reports
description: A detailed log of security incidents, system errors, and unexpected failures. Helps in identifying vulnerabilities and improving system reliability.
